article_title: Christensen: Kevin Griffin likes role of outsider
article_text:
Kevin Griffin hopes NC voters will be looking for nonpolitician

Durham businessman is making first run for political office

Says he is the centrist in the Democratic Senate primary

article_metadata.title: Christensen: Kevin Griffin likes role of outsider | News & Observer

og.description: At a time when outsiders are doing well in presidential politics, Kevin Griffin hopes that North Carolina voters will be looking for something different in next year’s U.S. Senate race as well.
og.title: Christensen: Kevin Griffin likes role of outsider
